title: Beating Depression: Learn the hidden secrets of beating depression
headline: Discover the hidden secrets of beating depression with this free online course!
description: In this free online course on depression you will learn how you can transform your life by beating depression! This self-help course covers all the major skills you need to beat depression and get your life back. In this training you will learn 1) Physical and psychological effects of depression 2) Science and stats about depression 3) Myths about depression 4) How to beat depression 5) Various medical treatments for depression and much more.
courseDescription:
Inside this free online course you will learn how to beat depression. The first part of this course focuses on gaining a strong understanding of depression. You will learn both its causes and symptoms. You will also be shown the physical and psychological effects and why they occur. This will help you better understand the nature of the problem and give you insights into how to treat it.

You are then going to learn about the 11 common myths about depression. These myths hurt people with this disorder and can discourage them from getting the assistance and treatment they so desperately need. We will also go over the major treatments, medical interventions and medications that can help people beat depression. By looking at this illness holistically, you will have a better picture of how to treat or deal with depression.

If you are dealing with depression personally or have a family member or friend who is dealing with it, this is a great course for you. Counselors, teachers, parents, managers and people who work closely with the public or large teams will greatly benefit from this introductory training. Depression is the number one mental disorder and virtually everyone’s life is touched by it in some way. This training can help you acquire the basic skills you need to deal with this challenge the right way.
